"A.D.2028/4/25/13:00": "Brilliant. But your victory no longer has any meaning."
"All this time you were stuck in my field, I've accomplished my mission."
"Tch, you were trying to stall us!"

"That's right. To give Sir Ardem time to reach
Godhood. So long as I accomplish that... Wh-"
"Oh my, for it to shatter so easily from just a little knock. Much like it's weilder, this field lacks willpower."
"Impossible... You broke my field... through force...?"
"...You're deploying a thin sheet of Ether embodied into a field? Interesting magic trick."
"But... it's weak. Almost like your human nature."
"Demon!"
"Why are you standing there dumbfounded? You should go on ahead."
"Are you sure?"
"It's always possible for me to kill Ardem instead, if you like."
"Plus, I have something else I want to do right now."

"I wanted to teach this fool who was despairing over humanity, the greatness of humanity. A
\"re-education\", if you will."
"Okay."
"Tch, wait!"

"Oh my, it's quite rude to turn your back on a
lady, you know?"

"You've distorted my field with just your will?!
You... You damned monster!"
"Oh, you! I'm just a normal human being. I'm just a human with a slightly longer lifespan, who trained their body all those years."
"Phaleg Ives. Mother Cluster, Apostle of Fire. I am the pinnacle of human potential."
"These fists, these legs... My entire body is the result of the human potential you refused to believe in."
"You'll savor this experience, won't you?"
"Quest progress has been saved."
